title: Can anyone ID this font?
content:
Hi

Can anyone ID this font?

Thanks

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131022050027im_/http:/typophile.com/files/02_exil_flyer_6522.jpg)
author: ThomasB

comments.content:
Previously asked many times: [http://typophile.com/node/72193](http://web.archive.org/web/20131022050027/http:/typophile.com/node/72193 "http://typophile.com/node/72193"), [http://typophile.com/node/67429](http://web.archive.org/web/20131022050027/http:/typophile.com/node/67429 "http://typophile.com/node/67429"), [http://www.typophile.com/node/80181](http://web.archive.org/web/20131022050027/http:/www.typophile.com/node/80181 "http://www.typophile.com/node/80181"), [http://typophile.com/node/79474](http://web.archive.org/web/20131022050027/http:/typophile.com/node/79474 "http://typophile.com/node/79474")  
 [Custom job by Claudia Klat](http://web.archive.org/web/20131022050027/http:/klat.info/work_exil.html) and Lisa Weiss. Not commercially available, some sort of DIN Mono Condensed. Suggestions for similars: [DIN Mono](http://web.archive.org/web/20131022050027/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/parachute/pf-din-mono/), [Lutz Headline](http://web.archive.org/web/20131022050027/http:/lineto.com/The+Fonts/Font+Categories/Headline+Fonts/Lutz+Headline/), [Korolev](http://web.archive.org/web/20131022050027/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/device/korolev/), [Wilma Base](http://web.archive.org/web/20131022050027/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/typeotones/wilma/), [JB Heureka](http://web.archive.org/web/20131022050027/http:/johannesbreyer.com/) (very close), [Jean-Luc Godard](http://web.archive.org/web/20131022050027/http:/www.carvalho-bernau.com/jlg/), [Dezen](http://web.archive.org/web/20131022050027/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/dizajndesign/dezen-pro/), [Monofonto](http://web.archive.org/web/20131022050027/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/larabie/monofonto/), [PDU](http://web.archive.org/web/20131022050027/http:/www.colophon-foundry.org/fonts/pdu/regular) (by [Dries Wiewauters](http://web.archive.org/web/20131022050027/http:/www.drieswiewauters.eu/type/project_09/), also very close using some alternates), [Sugo](http://web.archive.org/web/20131022050027/http:/www.dafont.com/sugo.font), [Tes](http://web.archive.org/web/20131022050027/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/alien/tes/), [DIN Engschrift](http://web.archive.org/web/20131022050027/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/engschrift/), [Vwk](http://web.archive.org/web/20131022050027/http:/www.t-wo.it/wp-content/uploads/2011/11/T-W-O_Vwk_Spec.pdf) by [Think Work Observe](http://web.archive.org/web/20131022050027/http:/www.t-wo.it/)
